# blockr.core

## Overview

blockr is a framework for **data analysis**, using a **web-based** point
and click user interface. Use blockr to create web apps that perform
**visual programming**, leveraging the power of **R**.

## Installation

You can install the development version of blockr.core from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
pak::pak("BristolMyersSquibb/blockr.core")
```

## What is blockr.core?

`blockr.core` is the entry point to blockr, providing the core
functionality needed to get started. It can be run as a stand-alone app,
but is designed with extensibility in mind. A rich **API** is provided
to connect your own blocks and override the default behaviors (e.g., you
can add your own GUI layer or serialization).

## What is a block?

A **block** is a fundamental unit of a data analysis workflow. A single
block performs a single **task**, such as loading or filtering or
visualization. Blocks can be joined together using a **DAG** (direct
acyclic graph) to create powerful data **workflows**.

## Who is it for?

blockr targets two main user groups:

- **non developers** are empowered to create insightful data workflows
  using pre-built blocks that can be **easily** connected, all without
  writing a single line of code.
- **developers** are provided with a set of tools to create new blocks
  and extend blockr, thereby enhancing the entire framework and
  fostering **collaboration** within teams and organisations.

## Key features

1.  **User-Friendly Interface**: Build data pipelines with intuitive
    interface, like with
    [blockr.ui](https://cynkra.github.io/blockr.ui/).
2.  **Flexibility**: Easily add, remove, or rearrange blocks in your
    pipeline.
3.  **Extensibility**: Developers can create custom blocks to extend
    functionality
    ([blockr.dplyr](https://github.com/cynkra/blockr.dplyr),
    [blockr.ai](https://github.com/cynkra/blockr.ai),
    [blockr.io](https://github.com/cynkra/blockr.io),
    [blockr.sdtm](https://github.com/cynkra/blockr.sdtm), …)
4.  **Reproducibility**: Pipelines created with `blockr.core` are easily
    shareable and reproducible, with exportable code.
5.  **Interactivity**: Real-time feedback as you build and modify your
    pipeline.

![blockr.ui example](reference/figures/blockr-ui.png)

blockr.ui example

## Getting started

To get started, we invite you to read this
[vignette](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/articles/get-started.html).

## Extending blockr

We started to build blockr extensions to enrich blockr.core’s
capabilities:

- [blockr.dplyr](https://github.com/cynkra/blockr.dplyr): an entry point
  to the `dplyr` ecosystem.
- [blockr.ai](https://github.com/cynkra/blockr.ai): LLM-powered blocks.
- [blockr.io](https://github.com/cynkra/blockr.io): handle different
  data input format (xpt, csv, …) and output for export.
- [blockr.sdtm](https://github.com/cynkra/blockr.sdtm): pharmaverse
  datasets blocks.

If you wish to learn to develop your own blocks, have a look at this
[vignette](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/articles/create-block.html).

# Package index

## Board objects

### Blocks

Data analysis pipelines are decomposed into steps, each represented by a
block.

- [`new_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_block.md)
  [`default_block_name()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_block.md)
  [`is_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_block.md)
  [`as_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_block.md)
  [`blocks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_block.md)
  [`is_blocks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_block.md)
  [`as_blocks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_block.md)
  : Blocks
- [`block_name()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_name.md)
  [`` `block_name<-`() ``](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_name.md)
  [`validate_data_inputs()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_name.md)
  [`block_inputs()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_name.md)
  [`block_arity()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_name.md)
  : Block utilities
- [`block_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_server.md)
  [`expr_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_server.md)
  [`block_eval()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_server.md)
  [`block_eval_trigger()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_server.md)
  [`block_render_trigger()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_server.md)
  : Block server
- [`block_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_ui.md)
  [`expr_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_ui.md)
  [`block_output()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/block_ui.md)
  : Block UI
- [`register_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`default_icon()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`default_category()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`suggested_categories()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`list_blocks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`registry_id_from_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`unregister_blocks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`register_blocks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`available_blocks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`block_metadata()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  [`create_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/register_block.md)
  : Block registry

Utilities for creating an working with links

  [`is_link()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_link.md)
  [`as_link()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_link.md)
  [`links()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_link.md)
  [`is_links()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_link.md)

  [`validate_links()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_link.md)
  : Board links

  [`` `stack_name<-`() ``](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_stack.md)
  [`validate_stack()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_stack.md)

  [`as_stacks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_stack.md)
  : Stacks
- [`stack_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/stack_ui.md)
  [`insert_stack_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/stack_ui.md)

## Board plugins

### Utilities

Tools for creating and working with board plugins.

- [`new_plugin()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`is_plugin()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`abort_not_null()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`as_plugin()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`plugin_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`plugin_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`plugin_validator()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`plugin_id()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`board_plugins()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`plugins()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`is_plugins()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`as_plugins()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  [`validate_plugins()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plugin.md)
  : Board plugin

### Instances

Plugin implementations provided by the core.

- [`manage_blocks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_blocks.md)
  [`manage_blocks_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_blocks.md)
  [`manage_blocks_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_blocks.md)
  : Plugin module for managing board blocks
- [`manage_links()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_links.md)
  [`manage_links_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_links.md)
  [`manage_links_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_links.md)
  : Plugin module for managing board links
- [`manage_stacks()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_stacks.md)
  [`manage_stacks_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_stacks.md)
  [`manage_stacks_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/manage_stacks.md)
  : Plugin module for managing board stacks
- [`edit_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/edit_block.md)
  [`edit_block_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/edit_block.md)
  [`edit_block_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/edit_block.md)
  [`block_summary()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/edit_block.md)
  : Plugin module for editing board blocks
- [`edit_stack()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/edit_stack.md)
  [`edit_stack_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/edit_stack.md)
  [`edit_stack_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/edit_stack.md)
  : Plugin module for editing board stacks
- [`generate_code()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/generate_code.md)
  [`generate_code_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/generate_code.md)
  [`generate_code_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/generate_code.md)
  : Code generation plugin module
- [`notify_user()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/notify_user.md)
  [`notify_user_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/notify_user.md)
  [`notify_user_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/notify_user.md)
  : User notification plugin module
- [`preserve_board()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/preserve_board.md)
  [`preserve_board_server()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/preserve_board.md)
  [`restore_board()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/preserve_board.md)
  [`preserve_board_ui()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/preserve_board.md)
  [`serialize_board()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/preserve_board.md)
  : Serialization plugin module

## Block classes

- [`new_data_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_data_block.md)
  [`new_dataset_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_data_block.md)
  [`new_static_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_data_block.md)
  : Data block constructors
- [`new_file_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_file_block.md)
  [`new_filebrowser_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_file_block.md)
  [`filebrowser_volumes()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_file_block.md)
  [`new_upload_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_file_block.md)
  : File block constructors
- [`new_parser_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_parser_block.md)
  [`new_csv_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_parser_block.md)
  : Parser block constructors
- [`new_transform_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_transform_block.md)
  [`new_fixed_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_transform_block.md)
  [`new_head_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_transform_block.md)
  [`new_merge_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_transform_block.md)
  [`new_rbind_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_transform_block.md)
  [`new_subset_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_transform_block.md)
  : Transform block constructors
- [`new_plot_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plot_block.md)
  [`new_scatter_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_plot_block.md)
  : Plot block constructors
- [`new_text_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_text_block.md)
  [`new_glue_block()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/new_text_block.md)
  : Text block constructors

## Utilities

### Serialization

Serialization and deserialization utilities.

- [`blockr_ser()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/blockr_ser.md)
  [`blockr_deser()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/blockr_ser.md)
  : Serialization utilities

### Logging

Tools for logging.

- [`write_log()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`log_fatal()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`log_error()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`log_warn()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`log_info()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`log_debug()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`log_trace()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`as_log_level()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`fatal_log_level`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`error_log_level`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`warn_log_level`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`info_log_level`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`debug_log_level`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`trace_log_level`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`get_log_level()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`cnd_logger()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  [`cat_logger()`](https://bristolmyerssquibb.github.io/blockr.core/reference/write_log.md)
  : Logging
